notes: Rakuten inventory is managed per item, with optional variant axes (horizontal/vertical). Simple items have no axes. No inbound/reserved breakdown — only a single available count is provided.
datetime_format: Not returned. Use current UTC timestamp on sync.

fields.name: itemUrl
fields.description: Item URL slug — the primary identifier for the inventory item

fields.name: inventoryCount
fields.description: Available quantity. Set to -1 to indicate unlimited stock (no inventory management).

fields.name: horizontalName
fields.description: First variant axis label (e.g. 'Size'). Only for products with variants.

fields.name: verticalName
fields.description: Second variant axis label (e.g. 'Color'). Only for products with two variant dimensions.

fields.name: itemPublicStatus
fields.description: 1=active, 0=inactive. Returned with getInventory in some API versions.
